stsjorbsmod:WandererStarterRelic.NAME: Wanderer Starter Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, remember stsjorbsmod:Patience. NL At the end of each combat, heal #b1 HP per stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:FragileMindRelic.NAME: Fragile Mind
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn #b7, stsjorbsmod:Snap.

stsjorbsmod:MindGlassRelic.NAME: Mind Glass
DESCRIPTIONS: Gaining stsjorbsmod:Clarity deals 3 damage to all enemies. NL Gaining 10 stsjorbsmod:Clarity in the same fight deals 100 damage to all enemies.

stsjorbsmod:AlchemistsFireRelic.NAME: Alchemist's Fire
stsjorbsmod:AlchemistsFireRelic.FLAVOR: Forca Messi! Forca Messi! Messi Animal!
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduces stsjorbsmod:Burning falloff rate to 10% per turn
